verse:
इह चेदशकद्‌बोद्धुं प्राक् शरीरस्य विस्रसः।
ततः सर्गेषु लोकेषु शरीरत्वाय कल्पते ॥
meaning: Meaning:Here, if one is unable to understand(Brahman) prior to separation from the human body(death), then after death for many Kalp's he is not given the human form.

upanishad-org.meaning: If in this world of men and before thy body fall from thee, thou art able to apprehend it, then thou availest for embodiment in the worlds that are His creations.
